name: BuildSDist
description: Creates a sdist using an installed copy of Python.
helpMarkDown: The *Build Python sdist* task uses a `setup.py` file to produce a source distribution. It will ensure that `setuptools` and `cython` are installed before running.
author: Steve Dower

inputs.name: outputdir
inputs.label: Output Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder where the sdist will be written. The `BuildSDist.dist` output variable is set to this folder.

inputs.name: pythonpath
inputs.label: Python
inputs.helpMarkDown: Directory containing the `python.exe` to use. By default, the last install added by either the Install Python or Use Python task will be used.

inputs.name: dependencies
inputs.label: Dependencies
inputs.helpMarkDown: Packages to install prior to building sdists. Prefix with `--upgrade` to ensure you have the latest version.

inputs.name: workingdir
inputs.label: Working Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Working directory for running the build. By default, the directory containing setup.py will be used.

outputVariables.name: dist
outputVariables.description: The directory distribution files were written to.
